about_the_game:
A minimalist puzzle game in which you discover hidden voxel objects. You can only see the edges of the puzzle and by rotating the object you adjust the puzzle pieces to their places. At the end of the level, you reveal a hidden voxel object.

Rotate the object



Match the puzzle



Reveal a voxel object
detailed_description:
A minimalist puzzle game in which you discover hidden voxel objects. You can only see the edges of the puzzle and by rotating the object you adjust the puzzle pieces to their places. At the end of the level, you reveal a hidden voxel object.

Rotate the object



Match the puzzle



Reveal a voxel object

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux 64 bit
  • Processor: i3 (64 bit)
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any GeForce or Radeon with 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any that supports stereo sound
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux 64 bit
  • Processor: i5 (64 bit)
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any GeForce or Radeon with 2 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any that supports stereo sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Monterey 12
  • Processor: i3 (64 bit) or Apple Silicon
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any GeForce or Radeon with 1 GB VRAM, Apple M1
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any that supports stereo sound
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Monterey 12

  • Graphics: Any GeForce or Radeon with 2 GB VRAM, Apple M1
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any that supports stereo sound

name: Unmurk

  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: i3 (64 bit)
  • Memory: 1000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any GeForce or Radeon with 1 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any that supports stereo sound

  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64 bit
  • Processor: i5 (64 bit)
  • Memory: 2000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Any GeForce or Radeon with 2 GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2000 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any that supports stereo sound

short_description: You only see the outer edges of the puzzle. Put the puzzles back into place to reveal a hidden voxel object.
supported_languages: English, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Traditional Chinese, Czech, Finnish, Spanish - Latin America, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Romanian, Thai, Ukrainian, Hungarian, French, German, Bulgarian, Simplified Chinese, Danish, Greek, Dutch, Japanese, Norwegian, Portuguese - Portugal, Russian, Swedish, Turkish, Vietnamese
